rule.title: Exchange Rules
rule.item1: Users can exchange other types of tokens by burning FR tokens
rule.item2: Exchange ratio is dynamically calculated according to the specific rules of the smart contract
rule.item3: Please ensure you have sufficient FR token balance for the exchange
rule.item4: Corresponding FR tokens will be permanently destroyed after the exchange transaction is completed
rule.item5: Exchange operations require a certain amount of on-chain confirmation time, please be patient
